Summary: The OCBC AI Scholarship aims to support talented individuals in driving the adoption of AI in banking and providing better customer value. The scholarship offers fully paid tuition fees, allowances, and a 4-week attachment to the OCBC AI Lab. Upon graduation, scholars will have a one-year rotation in various AI fields and be mentored by the bank's specialists. Eligible applicants must be enrolled in an AI-related postgraduate degree in NUS, NTU, or SMU, have a strong interest in a career with OCBC, and be willing to serve a bond period. Applications are open from 1 Sep to 25 Sep, with shortlisted applicants notified by the end of Sep. Relevant experience or achievements in AI will be an advantage.
